dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT :INS_START_DATE lc_start_date, :INS_END_DATE lc_end_date, :LOC office_cd FROM DUAL

SELECT DISTINCT j.job_gid, 'TSC' || j.job_xid job_no, TO_CHAR(j.insert_date,'MM/DD/YYYY') job_insert_date, (CASE WHEN js.update_date IS NULL THEN TO_CHAR(js.insert_date,'MM/DD/YYYY') ELSE TO_CHAR(j.update_date,'MM/DD/YYYY') END) book_confirm_date, cvr1.charter_voyage_refnum_value book_no, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_location_name(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIPPER') shipper_name, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_location_name(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','ULTIMATE CONSIGNEE') consignee_name, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_country(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','ULTIMATE CONSIGNEE') consignee_country, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_location_name(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','NOTIFY PARTY') notify_name, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.location_name_value(s.servprov_gid) carrier_name, TO_CHAR(j.attribute_date8,'MM/DD/YYYY') cutoff_dt, TRIM((CASE WHEN cv.voyage_name IS NULL THEN v.vessel_name ELSE cv.voyage_name END) || ' ' || cvr2.charter_voyage_refnum_value) vessel_voyage, (CASE WHEN s.source_location_gid = (SELECT orel.source_location_gid FROM job_order_release_join jorjoin INNER JOIN order_release orel ON jorjoin.order_release_gid = orel.order_release_gid WHERE jorjoin.job_gid = j.job_gid AND ROWNUM = 1) THEN '' ELSE glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.loc_city_province( (SELECT orel.source_location_gid FROM job_order_release_join jorjoin INNER JOIN order_release orel ON jorjoin.order_release_gid = orel.order_release_gid WHERE jorjoin.job_gid = j.job_gid AND ROWNUM = 1)) END) place_of_receipt, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.loc_city_province(s.port_of_load_location_gid) port_of_load, TO_CHAR(j.attribute_date7,'MM/DD/YYYY') etd, TO_CHAR(j.attribute_date6,'MM/DD/YYYY') eta, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.loc_city_country(s.port_of_dis_location_gid) port_of_discharge, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.location_name_value(s.dest_location_gid) place_of_delivery, l1.location_xid agent_code, l1.location_name agent_name, TRIM((SELECT listagg (ssunit.tag_3, ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY ssunit.tag_3) FROM s_ship_unit ssunit INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid = ssunit.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON ssej.s_equipment_gid = sessuj.s_equipment_gid WHERE ssej.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid)) containers, (CASE WHEN cvr3.charter_voyage_refnum_value IS NULL THEN (SELECT qr.quote_refnum_value FROM order_release orel INNER JOIN quote q ON orel.quote_gid = q.quote_gid INNER JOIN quote_refnum qr ON q.quote_gid = qr.quote_gid AND qr.quote_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.ITEM DESCRIPTION' WHERE orel.order_release_gid = jorj.order_release_gid) ELSE cvr3.charter_voyage_refnum_value END) commodity, (CASE WHEN l2.location_xid = 'TSCOP' THEN '51' WHEN l2.location_xid = 'TSCCST' THEN '45' WHEN l2.location_xid = 'TSCDG' THEN '52' ELSE '' END) division, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.latest_status(cv.charter_voyage_gid) status, j.attribute3 cust_ref FROM job j INNER JOIN job_order_release_join jorj ON j.job_gid = jorj.job_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON jorj.order_release_gid = ssul.order_release_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssul.s_ship_unit_gid = sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON sessuj.s_equipment_gid = ssej.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN shipment s ON ssej.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND s.transport_mode_gid = 'VESSEL-CO' AND s.is_primary = 'Y' AND s.perspective = 'B' INNER JOIN location loc1 ON s.source_location_gid = loc1.location_gid AND (loc1.country_code3_gid = 'USA' OR loc1.country_code3_gid = 'CAN') INNER JOIN shipment_involved_party sip1 ON s.shipment_gid = sip1.shipment_gid AND sip1.involved_party_qual_gid = 'FINAL_DESTINATION_AGENT' INNER JOIN contact c1 ON sip1.involved_party_contact_gid = c1.contact_gid AND c1.contact_xid IN ('CRESTU','CRESJO','CRESMU','TSCCRST','CRESDU','CRESRA') LEFT OUTER JOIN location l1 ON c1.location_gid = l1.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_involved_party sip2 ON s.shipment_gid = sip2.shipment_gid AND sip2.involved_party_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.OPS MANAGER' LEFT OUTER JOIN contact c2 ON sip2.involved_party_contact_gid = c2.contact_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location l2 ON c2.location_gid = l2.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN job_status js ON j.job_gid = js.job_gid AND js.status_type_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.SEND BOOKING CONFIRMATION' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sr ON s.shipment_gid = sr.shipment_gid AND sr.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'CHARTER VOYAGE' LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage cv ON 'SCOULAR/NVO.' || sr.shipment_refnum_value = cv.charter_voyage_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN vessel v ON cv.vessel_gid = v.vessel_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage_refnum cvr1 ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cvr1.charter_voyage_gid AND cvr1.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CURRENT BOOKING NUMBER' LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage_refnum cvr2 ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cvr2.charter_voyage_gid AND cvr2.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_VOYAGE_NUMBER' LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage_refnum cvr3 ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cvr3.charter_voyage_gid AND cvr3.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_COMMODITY' WHERE j.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/NVO' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT js.status_value_gid FROM job_status jstat WHERE jstat.status_type_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.JOB_CANCELLED' AND jstat.status_value_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.JOB_CANCELLED' AND jstat.job_gid = j.job_gid) AND (TO_DATE(j.insert_date,'dd-mm-rr') >= TO_DATE(:INS_START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(j.insert_date,'dd-mm-rr') <= TO_DATE(:INS_END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')) AND ((:LOC = 'ALL') OR (NOT :LOC = 'ALL' AND (:LOC = (SELECT loc.location_xid FROM shipment_involved_party sip INNER JOIN contact con ON sip.involved_party_contact_gid = con.contact_gid INNER JOIN location loc ON con.location_gid = loc.location_gid WHERE sip.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND sip.involved_party_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.OPS MANAGER')))) ORDER BY j.job_gid ASC
